EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.XLE.Health.N.G.N.18522.Healthcare nurture.Email 6 - Consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: Building a private network for real-time healthcare
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Building a private network for real-time healthcare Real-time healthcare requires an aware and adaptive technology infrastructure that senses, directs, and changes as needed. As a healthcare provider moving to a real-time care and cloud-based IT model, you need more flexible and agile networks.
Read our white paper, "Building a private network for real-time healthcare and the cloud <[[https://pages.nokia.com/18483.Bldg-a-private-network-for-real-time-Healthcare.html]]>" and learn how you can connect multiple sites and data centers to create a secure private cloud for critical healthcare workflow and applications. Sincerely,
Cindy Bergevin Head of Healthcare Marketing, Nokia Email: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>
Visit https://networks.nokia.com/healthcare/it <[[https://networks.nokia.com/healthcare/it]]> Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
